attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do NOT ban Christmas. What right have you got to take away our heritage and history?! I am a rainbow child, I am English but live in a foreign country where each cultural denomination has a right to celebrate it's beliefs from ramadam to Christmas, is Britain turning into a dictatorship?
Boo Cooney
www.sunnews.es

rejection.details: This Office is unaware of any plans to ban Christmas
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
False or incomplete name or address information
